topics.heading: Getting Started with Flutter and Dart
topics.description: Understand the basics of Flutter, set up the development environment, and learn Dart programming fundamentals.

topics.heading: Building Simple UIs with Flutter Widgets
topics.description: Learn to create user interfaces using Flutter's widget library, focusing on layouts, styles, and interactive elements.

topics.heading: Managing App State in Flutter
topics.description: Discover state management techniques such as Stateful Widgets and Provider to manage app state effectively.

outline.title: Intermediate Flutter Concepts and Backend Integration

topics.heading: Understanding Flutter Navigation
topics.description: Learn how to navigate between screens using Flutter's navigation system and manage routes efficiently.

topics.heading: Working with REST APIs
topics.description: Integrate backend services by consuming REST APIs, handling HTTP requests, and parsing JSON data.

topics.heading: Implementing Authentication
topics.description: Set up user authentication using Firebase or other third-party tools to secure your Flutter applications.

topics.heading: Optimizing App Performance
topics.description: Learn techniques to optimize your app's performance by reducing build times and improving UI responsiveness.

topics.heading: Publishing Apps to Play Store and App Store
topics.description: Understand the process of signing, building, and publishing your Flutter apps to Google Play and Apple App Store.

topics.heading: Building for Web and Desktop
topics.description: Explore Flutter’s capability to build web and desktop applications alongside mobile apps.
